website_summaries.verdict: A unique choice for a throw pillow with its cozy faux fur style. Surprisingly easy to clean. Durable.
pros: Consumers love the soft, cozy faux fur design with its stylish suede back
Faux fur texture can be revived by brushing gently
cons: Several consumers felt the size was smaller than represented, and some thought the texture and softness could be improved

customer_reviews.title: Brush it
customer_reviews.text: If you brush it, it becomes fluffy. Depends on the texture you want.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to make it look more expensive
customer_reviews.text: Alright! Listen up! I've had this pillow for a year now and put it thru the washer and dryer a good 6 times. Each time it came out looking a little more like dreads instead of a fuzzy pillow. So today I took a standard comb and combed out the cotton and now it is better than new and super soft yet again!!
customer_reviews.author: Elysia

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality pillow
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the quality. I purchased similar pillows, though they were another brand (Cynthia Rowley), and I wanted to match them without spending a fortune. These matched the color and quality perfectly, for less than 1/3 the price! I thought it would bother me that the back side of the pillow is not fur, but it looks amazing. A warning: They are not attractive when they arrive - they look like a matted dog. Once you brush them, they look great. 1st pic shows how pillows arrive; 2nd pic shows close up after brushing.
customer_reviews.author: jmysza

customer_reviews.title: very luxurious look that is the perfect accent to a modern, rustic, lux, or even vintage designed room or living area.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow gives me the exact modern/luxurious feel I was going for in my room, which features clean lines and neutral tones. This pillow provides the same aesthetic as much more expensive pillows that I was looking at. Other reviewers have pointed out that you can brush the pillow for a softer look, but I actually enjoy the rugged look that it comes in. I hope these pictures help.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahndipity.c

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of these pillows and how stuffed they are. I was searching for faux fur pillows but kept seeing only slip covers. This is what I was looking for, the whole pillow! I read the reviews for this pillow before I purchased and just like some others say, I brushed it out and it’s so soft! So now I have the perfect matching pillows for my fur rug. When it arrived it kinda looked like dreadlock style hair. See my pics, before combing out, and after! Also I took a pic of the back of the pillows. Very soft, comfy, and nice size. They are not a cover they are the whole pillow! Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Padrones

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a decorative pillow for my papasan chair. Reading the reviews before I bought it I was fully prepared to take a brush to it to fluff it out. Once I got it though I decided I didn't want to brush it out too much so I could keep some of the texture in the fur. It looks great and it's exactly what I wanted. As I needed it for decoration I didn't want it to be too wide/fluffy so it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kierce

customer_reviews.title: But I ordered two similar pillows from Walmart and they look great. Maybe these pillows are still circling the globe ...
customer_reviews.text: Well...there was nothing to click on that indicated that the pillow never arrived! I think it made it to a ship and left China but I never could figure out what happened to my two pillows. Very strange. But I ordered two similar pillows from Walmart and they look great. Maybe these pillows are still circling the globe on that freighter.
customer_reviews.author: Annova

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, But Arrive With Matted Fur
customer_reviews.text: These pillows arrived looked similar to the picture, however the fur was a little more matted. I saw pictures from other reviewers who showed the before and after of brushing the fur. I chose instead to lightly brush my pillows, because as a started to brush my pillows, some fur came out and I didn't want to loose too much of the fur. Despite only lightly brushing, the pillows looked a lot better and looked closer to the picture. I purchased these pillows for on my sofa and have found them to be a very comfortable head rest and beautiful accompaniment to my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marie

customer_reviews.title: I think many buyers might be confused about what Mongolian Fur texture feels/looks like and might have expected it to be more fu
customer_reviews.text: Was really hesitant about the quality given other reviews. However, this is really high quality given that is is faux fur. I didn't even need to comb out the fur. I think many buyers might be confused about what Mongolian Fur texture feels/looks like and might have expected it to be more fuzzy. Also, there are some complaints about the size, but I think the measurement is 18 inches diagonally.
customer_reviews.author: des_is_dead

customer_reviews.title: It's so fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is just as pictured! Fluffy Mongolian type fur! Great quality and size! Don't brush it! It's not meant to be a fur like bunny fur. It's meant to be sheepish type fur. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: You must comb first!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be discouraged when you get it and it looks a little matted. Take the time to comb it out and it’s soooo worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Nursemikaela

customer_reviews.title: Great Faux Fur Pillows
customer_reviews.text: We've had these since 2012 and they've been great. Very plush, have held up like new, and look almost exactly like the real thing. Not quite as soft as Mongolian wool, but I hate the idea of putting dead animals skins on my bed. These do the trick and look much more expensive than some similar options I've seen at other stores. I think they are very close to the colors in the photos, not bright white but more of a cream. Note- one side is a microsuede cloth, the other is faux fur, not all-around faux fur.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office desk chair to put behind my back for support but it is to thick and hard. But it is cute!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce H.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I have washed and dried this many times and it comes out brand new every time. I'm very happy with this . I can say this pillow is better than the more expensive one I brought at bed , bath & beyond, my pillow from there doesn't even look how it look once washed and dried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately made in China
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but very cute. Bummed to find out the outer layer was made in China and it can not be washed. Overall a good pillow. No shedding as of now and our daughter loves it. The purple is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful After Brushing
customer_reviews.text: Theses pillows are exactly what I wanted. They are well made, full and very soft. Thank god I read the reviews and learned that you have to brush them to get the fibers to fluff. They arrive looking like a wet dog. Once you brush them out, they’re beautiful. Pic on the left is fresh out of the box. On the right is after brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Keiani

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT boho pillow. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect pillow! Looks expensive and stylish. Great for bono decor. I bought mine about a year ago and it's held up really well. It's soft and comfy! Also note that mine is more of a cream or slightly off-white. Not yellow but not white white. This was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman Incognito

customer_reviews.title: This is not a white pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is not white but more of a off white.. It is soft and I think my 2 year old will still like it. I had to brush it out quite a bit but I expected that. I do think it's overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I brushed it and now it's nice. It doesn't shed TOO much
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's an ok pillow. I was REALLY thrown off by it at first, but then, as the reviews said, I brushed it and now it's nice. It doesn't shed TOO much, but I find that mine, unlike others, does shed a little. It's a nice off white color, but not too off white that it's noticeably creamy.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this pillow. As mentioned by another reviewer, I brushed it upon receiving to freshen them up and they look great. I've had many compliments. Good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Hananilee

customer_reviews.title: I love these. These arrived and they are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these. These arrived and they are beautiful. I purchased 8 more!! No need to brush. If you have nails just clean up with fingernails. No harsh smell. I would let my baby lay on one of these. Yes, they are smaller than 18 inches but they are gorgeous! Easily a $40 pillow!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: ... these pillows for my white leather sofa in the great room. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought four of these pillows for my white leather sofa in the great room. Unfortunately, my dog liked them a little "too much," and I had to come up with a new plan. I decided to use them in my bedroom to complete my "Shabby Chic" look, and they work great, if not better, than they would have on the sofa. So glad that worked out. The pillows are just lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have faux fur on back
customer_reviews.text: Item is nice, but didn't have faux fur on back of pillow, cheaply made for price. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C Williams

customer_reviews.title: its so fluffyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: At first, I bought it quite a while ago. I love faux fur and I found this pillow. When I got it, I was extremely disappointed to find that the stands were sort of like crimped together. I tossed it into my closet for a few months. When I found it again, I was going to write a negative review when I came across other reviews. They said that their pillows got soft when they brushed it. Of course, i tried it. A bit of fur got in the brush, but it was a small price to pay for the finishing product. It is so soft and fluffy and I am in love with it. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its okay!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you will get the same quality. DO NOT brush it if you don't want a frizzy pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow, though
customer_reviews.text: Looked decent on my couch the one day it was there, until I made the mistake of leaving and my dog decided to destroy our new furry friend. Sadly, it was shredded past the point of repair, and I have learned a valuable lesson about purchasing animal-like home items. Good pillow, though, for everyone without a crazed lab.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: They're ok but the shedding fluff gets annoying
customer_reviews.text: They're cute but get a little matted and annoying after a while. They also sometimes shed, which can get a little frustrating. Wouldn't buy them again, but won't be the throwing out the ones we currently have.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... of the package my mom commented how it looked nice before brushing
customer_reviews.text: I also brushed this to get the fluffy look but when it first came out of the package my mom commented how it looked nice before brushing. I thought it looked a bit matted, but she actually preferred the crinkled faux fur look to the fluffy final product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great update for couch or bed.
customer_reviews.text: I had these in my cart when the price was only $10 something and they went to $14.99. Purchased because I wanted to buy before the price went up again. Looked around online for these and they were the best priced. The back is a soft suede. They are soft and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Candie

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two similar pillows from Forever 21. After seeing how they looked on my couch, I realized I needed another pillow. This is a great match. Soft and comfortable. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Fine....Looks So Fine With Anything! Great Pillow. Very chic looking. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I found one of these pillows at Big Lots for the same price but only bought one. I was sorry I didn't get 2. However, thanks to Amazong shopping I found it! I don't have it yet, should arrive this coming week, but if it's the same as the one I already have, it's going to be awesome and I will put it on my new Lush Decor Venetian comforter...in Silver....yum!
customer_reviews.author: SAR

customer_reviews.title: You would have to brush it out almost every week to make it look good.
customer_reviews.text: Use a hairbrush to brush it out but expect for the hairs to remain stuck on your brush. You would have to brush it out almost every week to make it look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It’s perfect and looks much more expensive than it is. It looks and feels real, the fur is textured and wavy, like the real deal, without any guilt. I thought it was just a pillow cover, but mine came as a stuffed pillow, FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Sheds a lot
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful but it literally sheds everywhere even after brushing. It’s now all over my room and I can’t seem to get rid of it no matter how much I vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed as they were not 18 inch as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pillows for my white couch. I was a little disappointed as they were not 18 inch as advertised. I kept them because they worked with my couch but I wished they would have been 18 inch
customer_reviews.author: msimagemaker

customer_reviews.title: Small and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected - it’s a kid’s size and not big enough for my 16 year old daughter, but it’s very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Lazo

customer_reviews.title: Buggy pillows
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these pillows were beautiful when I bought them. I decided to brush out the yarn couls for a fluffier look. To my disgust the brushing uncovered dozens of insects in the wool. I would not buy them again, ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Fun
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pillows. I like shag pillows but these are a little different. They're like a shaggy dog. I always like something different and these hit it for me. Nice color, comfy, and bounce them around in the dryer for 10 minutes on low they come out fluffy and good looking (also takes the dust & pet hair off) for me. Please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Hudec

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this faux fur pillow. You can definitely tell that it's faux and not of the best quality, but what can you expect for $20. I was fooled by all of the positive reviews that maybe it would seem more real than it does. If getting real fur is out of your price (or ethical) range, this would be an okay choice, but this pillow isn't really a replacement for the real thing. I ended up returning it and buying the real thing on sale at West Elm.
customer_reviews.author: FH

customer_reviews.title: I love these they are prettier than you can imagine
customer_reviews.text: I got these for ten bucks each thinking they were just covers , now whole big beautiful luxurious pillows .. I could not have been happier .. these are Def worth at least double maybe even triple that .. they are my favorite things in my apartment now
customer_reviews.author: shana otolo

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. Initially was tentative about ordering due to reviews of the matted fur, but followed another review (thank you BTW) about brushing it out. So immediately took a hair brush (don't have to brush hard) and in three minutes it looked AWESOME! Ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kersten

customer_reviews.title: Soft pillow
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews that said to brush out the pillow and after I did that I loved it. I like that it comes stuffed and you don’t have to hassle with a pillow and cover.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Shealy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I like these pillows, however, thay are in a spcae in my home that does not get much traffic. The fabric backing is fairly unattractive (and a bit thin), but the furry front looks good. They work well for my purpose. If you were putting them in a place where both sides could be seen or were planning to put them through a lot of wear, you might want to invest in something else.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Too much work to keep it looking pretty
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was nice when I received it but over time the hair got tangled and you have to brush it everyday after using. Not very practical.
customer_reviews.author: Robe

customer_reviews.title: This pillow was so pretty the texture kind of bothered me but I got ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was so pretty the texture kind of bothered me but I got over it it was so pretty it has an off white color so can look dirtish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college dorms
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dorm my freshman year of college and I have used it for the past 5 years! it goes with everything and stay relatively clean!
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice furry fluffy pillow
customer_reviews.text: its exactly what you're ordering. I didnt measure the size to see if its exactly 18 inches but its normal throw pillow size. and it DOES come kind of matted up and not soft and fluffy looking. but come on people, its been in a package forever. use a brush and brush all the knots and what not out of it and you're left with a nice furry comfortable fur pillow. but be warned, if you use it to sleep on, that ish really tickles your face and nose. but if you just want something soft to rub while you watch tv, i highly recommend this pillow...or a baby kitten.
customer_reviews.author: KermyPiggy

customer_reviews.title: Best throw pillow ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is most definitely one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon and I'm a big spender here. I took everyone's advice and brushed out the pillow and was extremely satisfied. Well worth the money and it will look amazing in my college dorm room. I will post a before and after photo.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great pillows for an awesome price. They add so much fun to the space. Great quality. Well made. So happy I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of four

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this value and could not pass it by . I have a large similar pillow I paid a lot more for!! So this smaller one just completed the look. It's a pillow!! Not a cover!! So the value is great. Thank you I love my purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: kerrin

customer_reviews.title: I like this pillow a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this pillow a lot, I actually got a couple for my bed. They are soft and nice. I've seen a bunch of 1 star reviews, saying "ITS NOT WHITE ITS CREAM" and indeed it is -- all you have to do to know that is look at the photos -- I think the pillows look just like the pictures. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely. Just brush it
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow!! I ordered two and was a little scared because of some pictures I saw of the pillow now being true to picture. Well YES that's true. Because in order for the pillow to match the picture you must BRUSH it out! Once you do that, it's beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these fluffy pillows! Very shabby cool and work great with my look!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: As pictured, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! It adds the perfect, subtle touch of luxury to the accent chair in my living room. My dog loves to snuggle up with this pillow, and/or lie on top of it...but it's easy to fluff it back out and it still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: AKH

customer_reviews.title: I was a little hesitant at first but I'm glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first but I'm glad I got it. Goes great with collection and I want more! Elegant and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow, I have it on my bed. However, when I received it I had to comb through the faux fur with my fingers and it shedded a little but overall I really like this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Starlyn159

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my living room and adds texture and style to my living room!
customer_reviews.author: PauPau

customer_reviews.title: So fluffy :)
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted for way less than I would have spent elsewhere. I got them as a lightning deal so keep your eyes peeled!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but are really ivory not white!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Bought two once before a couple of years ago !
customer_reviews.author: gnpi

customer_reviews.title: They look SOGOOD!
customer_reviews.text: OMG - I bought 3 of these to spread around my living room. I was concerned because if the low price the quality may not be good, but they are GREAT!!! They look so good, saw the same pillow at Home Goods for $25, so it was a real steal here in Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Travel Obsessed

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty pillow. Ross has same ones
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty pillow. Ross has same ones. Little larger tho for same price. This pillow is like a microfiber material so it's soft. Great for decor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible poorly made low-quality pillow do not order this. I returned mine
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Little cheap but gets job done
customer_reviews.text: They're a little cheap looking in person but still cute. Not Restoration Hardware or anything like that. I've noticed my two year old can easily remove the faux fur with the lightest touch, so that could end up being annoying. They're soft and comfortable, so for the price-they're just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ReadRnot

customer_reviews.title: Cat love.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but the cat loves it! So I try to use it for my back but seldom get to.
customer_reviews.author: Redhorses

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super cool and cute. Great quality, couldnt be any better. Gets lots of compliments and looks cute
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Griffin

customer_reviews.title: They’re “alright.” Not the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: They’re “OK.” It’s more like a “moppy” texture than a “fur” or sheep’s skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these pillows and wish I had bought more! They are super comfy and they don't leave stands of fabric everywhere. They are also a bit bigger than I thought they would be which was a very nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: CinnamonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been a dream! An incredible value and doesn't shed. Only needs a quick brush to freshen it up. Recommend fully!
customer_reviews.author: NerdsAreSexyy

customer_reviews.title: The Cutest!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! It added the perfect touch to my bedroom to make it look complete and trendy. I'd order it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi {SincerelyCandid}

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are beautifully made. It does make difference if you brush it but it's really your choice of doing it or not. It looks good both ways in my opinion. With this price, I'm really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pksmom

customer_reviews.title: Kind of Looks Fake
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this pillow to replace a fake cream fur one I had. My other one was soft and short fur, this one has long fur and it's pretty shiny... making it look really fake and cheap. It is a good size but it's a little big to be a couch pillow. All in all, I wish I would have seen it before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: A great deal when I bought two of them. Fur on just 1 side, but it is long and very fluffy. Not overly soft, but very cute, warm, and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory JM

customer_reviews.title: Great faux product!
customer_reviews.text: Look great for the price. I typically like feather/down alternative pillows but wanted something a little more fun and textured for darker arm chairs and these look great!
customer_reviews.author: JulynnM

customer_reviews.title: Faux fur, real great pillow
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure from what Mongolian animal this "faux fur" pillow was supposed to be from. Maybe a yak? Or a yeti? Either way, it's very cool, very soft, very comfortable... and gets lots of positive comments from guests.
customer_reviews.author: saenyc

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! I've been searching for a pillow like this
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I've been searching for a pillow like this, and all the other stores (PB Teen, land of nod, etc) are charging $40+, without the insert!! This was an amazing find.
customer_reviews.author: e2them2theb

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy..
customer_reviews.text: They look a little cheaper in person they aren't as fluffy. The hairs are all stuck together like matted. So idk. It wasn't what I was expecting.... And hey shed..
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is freaking awesome! I was skeptical because of the other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is freaking awesome! I was skeptical because of the other reviews but bought it anyway and do not regret it didn't even have to brush it. Came straight out of the oversized Amazon box and onto my couch!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Fairly realistic Mongolian Fur. Color accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and cute. Look great. I have other real Mongolian fur things, and these are a pretty good replica! Not cheap. But bought two to add a little flair to a mini love seat in front of fire with a lambswool rug.
customer_reviews.author: It's Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice especially for the price. I have washed them several times even and hung to dry. I see they get matted along the edges but that’s with a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these pillows per my designer's recommendation after much searching. The color is a soft off-white cream which blended beautifully with a sheep skin rug. I purchased another set of pillows that were 3x the price and while lovely, those were a much brighter white and didn't go as well with the décor. They came quickly and I'm happy happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! Very nice quality and have retained their fluffiness over 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very soft, the fur is full. it has the proper amount of stuffing, giving it a full look. The faux fur reminds me of troll hair. This pillow does not have fur in the back. The back is a off white /cream color and very soft material. The cover is not removable.
customer_reviews.author: DemarieHnk

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow and it's exactly what I wanted. When you take the pillow out it looks scraggly, so I gently brushed out the pillow a little bit and now it looks nice and fluffy. Since I brushed it out it also looks more white too.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: beautiful. fancy. boujee.
customer_reviews.text: love these!!!! doing a white and gold furry bedroom theme and these are the finishing touch. super fancy looking and SUCH A STEAL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Short

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty cute. For the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty cute. For the price, the quality is great (doesn't look really cheap). It doesn't look super expensive either, but the quality is pretty good, and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LauraD

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this Pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants this pillow that sees it! So soft and furry!! Changes your room. Great gift for anyone!!! Super price and fast ship!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly as pictured and I couldn't be happier :) The white is perfect - actually as you can see compared to the white on a computer screen, the pillow is more ivory than white. It is very luxurious and would make an awesome gift. I wish it came in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: ladybinx

customer_reviews.title: but that's fine for me
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about how white or not white these pillows were made me second guess my purchase, but it wasn't a big deal at all. I'd say they are more cream than white, but that's fine for me. They look nice and have kept up well since we bought them a couple months ago. The "fur" is only on the front side of the pillow, which I didn't realize when I purchased, but also don't mind. Also, great pricing. If you're on the fence, I'd say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Worried at first
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first how these pillows would look with my leather couch but they look great. They really added to my decor. I bought another pair to go on my daughters bed. It adds a pop of color and some fun to a room. The fur does tend to get matted though.
customer_reviews.author: janejo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty soft and durable. Came on time and looks great on my sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Morton

customer_reviews.title: Not so soft
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this pillow but it felt strange and had static electricity out of packaging. Static continued after I set it out a few days before returning it. The fibers are really long and doesn't look like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Green eyed women

customer_reviews.title: Not Nice
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this pillow online, I knew immediately that it would be the perfect piece for my Louis ghost chair and my makeup vanity. I love luxurious and beautiful looks. When I saw the pillow in my hands, my initial thought was that the pillow looked like an unkempt Great Pyrenees. The texture is not soft, either. It will look out-of-place, obtuse even, in a pretty setting. I would not buy this particular product, unless you do not mind a matted hair look for a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Shije

customer_reviews.title: More beautiful than pictured....
customer_reviews.text: The pictures on Amazon do not do justice to these pillows...I just re-decorated one of my bedrooms,and these pillows add the touch the bed needed....Very different than many throw pillows..I'd love to see them in a variety of colors....
customer_reviews.author: SWFLORIDA1106

customer_reviews.title: Great value as this came with the pillow too
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was just ordering covers. Great value as this came with the pillow too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this pillow!So soft and looks just or better than the high end ones. So happy with it thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: These look and feel so much better than much more expensive alternatives that I was considering
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel so much better than much more expensive alternatives that I was considering. I hesitate to order certain things online so it took me a while to decide to purchase these, but they're a good choice if you're looking for something in this style. I ordered a second one after the first one arrived. Wasn't planning on being that person with two shaggy pillows on the sofa, but here we are.
customer_reviews.author: maz

customer_reviews.title: very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and they are great! They are a lot more "textured" in person but in a good way in my opinion. They are definitely not white white, but are more of an off white/very light cream. Nice, full pillows too! And the back is like a microsuede type material. Would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sorsby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a couple of side chairs I have in my living room, they are really cute, I've only had them a day so I can't really speak to their durability. They are exactly what I was looking for and I caught them at a great price. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyBEBE

customer_reviews.title: It looks nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks nothing like the picture. It's not white, more like an ivory color. And it's not fur, not sure how to describe it. But it won't be what you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Nhon2

customer_reviews.title: Could Easily Pass for More Expensive Pillows
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. Be sure to use a brush to comb it out for a fluffy, luxurious appearance. Definitely looks significantly more luxe than the price would suggest.
customer_reviews.author: templebar78

product_meta.title: Brentwood 18-Inch Mongolian Faux Fur Pillow, White
product_meta.description: Size:18x18| Color:WhiteHal Alden founded Brentwood Originals in Los Angeles circa 1958 selling decorative pillows and quilted bedspreads. Brentwood is committed to developing and delivering a quality product in a timely fashion. We deliver a product that provides not just a fashion statement within the home, but a product that provides the consumer with both the joy of adding to their lifestyle as well as the satisfaction of value. Value is a combination of price, durable construction and quality components. This pursuit is a never ending continuum of sourcing and training within our own facilities and those of our suppliers. Industry-leading best practices in cross training, transparency, and rigorous quality control are key to these improvements.
feature_bullets: PLUSH FILLING that provides extreme comfort and support for lounging around
PERFECTLY VERSATILE designs to accent your bed or sofa as a throw pillow
CONSITENT HIGH-END QUALITY from one of the top decorative pillow manufacturers, Brentwood Originals.
EASY TO CLEAN by spot cleaning with only a damp cloth
